countdown.description: Click ‘Remind Me’ to get on the list and be the first to know when the new series inspired by The Sims™ drops Dec 15th. Or you can download The Sims™ 4 for free and spark something, now.
countdown.caption: Spark Something with

episodes.headline: Join aspiring creative Amanda on a one-of-a-kind journey to find inspiration.

episodeData.title: EP.1 Find Your Perspective
episodeData.description: Amanda discovers the world can be a canvas for taste-making and curiosity with the help of interior designer Francesca Grace.

episodeData.title: EP.2 Express Yourself
episodeData.description: Multidisciplinary artist Brielle Jenkins, master of self-adornment, takes Amanda through an exercise in self-expression—in and out of game.

episodeData.title: EP.3 Embrace the Chaos
episodeData.description: When creation gets messy in the ceramics studio, Amanda embraces the imperfect process with multi-hyphenate musician Cale Tyson.

creatives.name: Amanda Gordon
creatives.title:
Aspiring
 Filmmaker
creatives.description: Meet Amanda—a multi-hyphenate content creator who writes and directs short films and online videos. Constantly searching for what sparks her next endeavor, she’s finding originality and inspiration around every corner.

creatives.name: Francesca Grace
creatives.title: Interior Designer
creatives.description: A staging expert and mother of chickens (Oh hey, Pickle). When she’s not sourcing vintage furniture or reimagining spaces, Francesca is building virtual worlds in The Sims™ to explore new ideas and just have fun with off-the-wall thinking.

creatives.name: Brielle Jenkins
creatives.title: Multidisciplinary Artist
creatives.description: Femlord Brielle Jenkins is always pushing the boundaries of fashion by creating custom airbrush fits, one reworked garment at a time. From childhood until now, Brielle has been playing The Sims™ to spark creativity, mischief and the impossible.

creatives.name: Cale Tyson
creatives.title: Musician
creatives.description: Whether it’s writing a new song or playing with ceramics, Cale finds inspiration in everything he does. During the early part of his career, he used The Sims™ to imagine new worlds and discover hidden talents.

productGallery.headline: Spark Something with these Packs
productGallery.alexaDescription: Win the game of creativity with The Sims’ new Alexa theme! Get TS4 player tips, learn the Simlish phrase of the day, or find your spark with {{Not}} Creative inspired prompts.

resources.disclaimer: *Additional content requires separate purchase & all base game updates. Applicable platform account, internet connection, and EA account may be required. Age restrictions apply.
resources.unsupportedVideoMessage: Sorry, your browser doesn't support embedded videos.
